name: For Sale
description:
Game created for the "Hitsplay Jam" organized the french newspaper LeMonde.fr

The theme was the short movie "Tango" by Zbigniew Rybczynski, 1980

https://vimeo.com/90339479

In this narrative puzzle experience the player must restore shards of an old house memory.

The game has been part of a 2 weeks exhibition @LaGaîtéLyrique in Paris in their neat Video Game Space.

For Sale Trailer :


Hitsplay Jam Projects :
http://playtime.blog.lemonde.fr/2013/06/29/hits-pl...
For Sale won the Jury Grand Prize :
http://playtime.blog.lemonde.fr/2013/07/08/for-sal...

Team Mighty Raccoon is :

Jérémie Lazard, Kevin Pinson, Matthias Fuchs, Noah Young, Nathan Lemaire and Maxime Sauvage

http://imgur.com/K3BXALQ
